title: Mastering Model Context Protocol (MCP)
description: An in-depth course on understanding, implementing, and deploying applications using the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

sections.title: Introduction to MCP
sections.description: Overview of MCP, its purpose, and significance in AI applications.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of Model Context Protocol (MCP)?
answers: To limit the training data of AI models
To enable AI models to connect with external data sources, tools, and environments
To replace prompting when using Large Language Models
To create a new programming language for AI
questions.note: Understanding MCP's role is crucial. Read more

questions.question: What problem does MCP primarily aim to solve?
answers: The high cost of training LLMs
The difficulty in creating new AI algorithms

sections.title: MCP Capabilities
sections.description: Deep dive into the core primitives of MCP: Tools, Resources, Prompts, and Sampling.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a core primitive of MCP?
questions.note: Familiarize yourself with MCP's core components. Details here

questions.question: In MCP, what is the role of 'Sampling'?
answers: Provides read-only access to data sources
Executable functions invoked by the AI model
Allows servers to request the client to perform LLM interactions
questions.note: Sampling enables server-driven agentic behaviors. Explore more

sections.title: Building with MCP
sections.description: Practical implementation of MCP servers and clients using available SDKs and frameworks.

questions.question: Which framework is used to create a web interface and MCP server in the course's end-to-end project?
questions.note: Gradio simplifies building MCP servers. See implementation

questions.question: What is the primary function of the 'analyze_file_changes' tool in the PR Agent project?
answers: Retrieves git diff information and changed files
Allows Claude to recommend the most appropriate template
Deploys the MCP server to Hugging Face Spaces
questions.note: Understanding tool functions is key. Detailed guide

sections.title: Advanced MCP Development
sections.description: Exploration of advanced MCP features, architecture, and real-world integration patterns.

questions.question: What is the recommended approach when MCP tool responses exceed the 25,000 token limit?
answers: Implement output limiting strategies like truncating large responses
Split the response into multiple parts without truncation
Avoid using tools that generate large outputs
questions.note: Managing output sizes ensures reliability. Learn how

questions.question: In the context of MCP, what does the 'get_pr_templates' tool do?
questions.note: Tool functions are integral to MCP workflows. Explore tools
